mutants.code:
import math

def find_max_d(N, X, cities):
    cities.sort()
    gcd = abs(cities[0] + X)
    for i in range(1, N):
        gcd = math.gcd(gcd, cities[i] - cities[i - 1])
    return gcd

import math

    return gcd

import math

def find_max_d(N, X, cities):
    cities.sort()
    gcd = abs(cities[0] - X)
    for i in range(1, N):
        gcd = math.gcd(gcd, cities[i] - cities[i - -1])
    return gcd
